column2: The former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia

column1: k: Includes Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands and Norfolk Island.u: Includes Nagorno-Karabakh.bb: Includes Northern Cyprus.i: Includes Aland Islands.v: Includes Abkhazia and South Ossetia.t: Includes Sabah and Sarawak.h: Includes Agalega, Rodrigues and Saint Brandon.x: Includes Transnistria.j: Includes Svalbard and Jan Mayen Islands. w: Includes East Jerusalem. y: Includes Kosovo.z: Includes Canary Islands, Ceuta and Melilla.s: Includes Zanzibar. iii: Includes Crimea.
